name: BluetoothDevice.connectGATT
description: The BluetoothDevice.connectGATT() method returns a Promise that resolves to an instance of BluetoothGATTRemoteServer.
content:
Non-standard
This feature is non-standard and is not on a standards track. Do not use it on production sites facing the Web: it will not work for every user. There may also be large incompatibilities between implementations and the behavior may change in the future.

Obsolete
This feature is obsolete. Although it may still work in some browsers, its use is discouraged since it could be removed at any time. Try to avoid using it.

The BluetoothDevice.connectGATT() method returns aPromise that resolves to an instance ofBluetoothGATTRemoteServer.
